_header: Jesu as Thou me made and bought
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Jesus — one monoryming quatrain

CULDd564.Transcription:
[I]hesu als þow me made & boghtÞu be my lufe & all
                    my thoghtand help þatI war to be broghtWith owten þe may I
                    do noght
